thread.title: Lovely stay in the greatest part of Paris!
thread.title_full: Lovely stay in the greatest part of Paris! - Review of Hotel Opera Marigny, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: lduncan2017
title: Lovely stay in the greatest part of Paris!
text:
The hotel was in a fantastic location, just a 2 minute walk from the Madeliene Cathedral and metro - a 10 minute journey to the Eiffel.
The hotel staff were amazing - extremely accommodating and friendly. Will defo recommend this hotel and head back on my next trip!
Room Tip: Request a room that faces the front of the hotel. See more room tips
